item.title: Making Heavy-Duty Steel Rollers
item.description: Solid steel billets are machined into heavy-duty rollers used in industrial applications. What machining steps ensure strength and balance?

media:content.media:title: Making Heavy-Duty Steel Rollers
media:content.media:description: Solid steel billets are machined into heavy-duty rollers used in industrial applications. What machining steps ensure strength and balance?

item.title: Repairing a Broken Bail Arm
item.description: Part one of a step-by-step bail arm repair, covering damage assessment and initial machining. What determines whether repair or replacement is best?

item.title: Crafting a custom Caterpillar engine pin
item.description: Watch the precise creation of a custom pin for a Caterpillar 3500 series engine cylinder head, showcasing advanced machining techniques. What makes custom engine parts critical?

item.title: Removing a Worn Track Adjuster Sleeve
item.description: Air arc gouging is used to remove a worn sleeve from a track adjuster assembly. How does controlled material removal speed up major repairs?

item.title: Replacing a Damaged Grader Circle
item.description: An overview of removing and replacing a worn grader circle, highlighting wear points and precision fitting. Why is this component vital to grader performance?

item.title: Boring Out a Bucket Cylinder Rod Eye
item.description: Precision boring work on a bucket cylinder rod eye, focusing on alignment and surface finish. Why is accuracy critical in high-load joints?

item.title: Machining an Adapter Plate for a Dyno
item.description: The creation of a custom adapter plate for a transmission dynamometer. Why are one-off components common in testing environments?

item.title: Repairing a 16H Hydraulic Cylinder
item.description: A hydraulic cylinder repair focusing on inspection, machining, and reassembly. What causes failure in high-load cylinder systems?

item.title: Testing out the new I450 Arc Spray Machine by Metallisation
item.description: A first test of a new I450 arc spray machine, focusing on coating application and performance. How does arc spraying extend component life?

item.title: Upgrading a Franna MAC-14 Crane
item.description: An overview of modifications that increase capability on a Franna MAC-14 crane. How does added power change performance in lifting operations?

item.title: Making a New Cylinder Rod and Eye
item.description: The machining process behind producing a new hydraulic cylinder rod and eye. What tolerances matter most for long-term reliability?

item.title: Replacing Pistons in a Large Excavator
item.description: A look inside piston replacement work on a large excavator, including disassembly and inspection. What signs indicate piston wear in heavy machinery?

item.title: Machining a New Eye for a D10 Dozer
item.description: A detailed look at machining a replacement eye for a D10 dozer component, focusing on fit, tolerance, and durability. What makes these parts so critical?

item.title: Reinstalling the Bail Arm On Site
item.description: Part two of returning a repaired bail arm to service, focusing on alignment and installation in the field. What challenges come with on-site repairs?

item.title: Making a Flogging Spanner for Inspection
item.description: The process of crafting a flogging spanner used to inspect a strut cylinder. Why are custom tools sometimes essential in heavy maintenance work?

item.title: Building New Boom Lift Cylinders
item.description: The process of crafting new boom lift cylinders for a Franna crane, from machining to assembly. How are heavy-lift components designed for reliability?

item.title: From raw metal to precision machined parts
item.description: Watch raw metal take shape as itâ€™s transformed into finished machined parts. This video highlights engineering skill, tooling, and accuracy inside the workshop. What makes precision machining so critical?

item.title: Machining Polyurethane Bushings
item.description: Watch the process of machining new bushings from polyurethane plastic, highlighting material handling and precision techniques. A clear view into workshop engineering and component production. Why is polyurethane often chosen for bushings?

item.title: Taking Apart a Large Horizontal Milling Machine
item.description: A step-by-step breakdown of dismantling a massive horizontal milling machine, focusing on access, safety, and component handling. What goes into servicing equipment of this size?

item.title: Replacing a Broken A-Frame Eye
item.description: A close look at repairing a broken eye on a truck A-frame using machining and welding techniques. How do precise repairs restore structural strength?
